message.body: In reference to your response to our Vantage Carton Offer, your request did not meet the requirements of the offer for the reasons checked below:
reasons: You did not enclose the order form or an incomplete order form was enclosed.
You sent a copy of the order form. An original order form must be submitted.
You did not sign the order form, as required.
You did not provide your birthdate required or you included the current date.
You did not choose a Vantage carton style Proof of Purchase.
You did not enclose the appropriate number of outer pack wrappers with UPC symbols for the items you requested.
Your entire request is being returned with this letter. Resubmitted requests must be returned within 15 days from receipt of this letter to the P.O. Box indicated on the order form.
message.proof_of_purchase: You did not enclose the appropriate number of outer pack wrappers with UPC symbols for the items you requested.
message.return_instructions: Your entire request is being returned with this letter. Resubmitted reguests must be returned within 15 days from receipt of this letter to the P.O. Box indicated on the order foru.
message.contact_info: If you have any questions concerning this offer, please call 1-800-926-8814 Monday through Friday 7:00 A.M.-6:30 P.M., Central Standard Time.
